# Epic: Test Infrastructure Modernization

**ID**: EPIC-2025-Q4-TEST
**Status**: In Progress
**Priority**: P1

## Vision

Create a world-class test infrastructure with zero duplication, robust isolation, and shared fixtures that make writing tests a pleasure instead of a chore.

## Features

- FS-042: Test Infrastructure Cleanup ✅ 70% complete
- FS-043: Test Performance Optimization (planned)
- FS-044: Test Coverage Automation (planned)

## Success Metrics

- Test health: 7% → 25% (target)
- CI time: 15 min → 5 min (target)
- Test duplication: 48% → 0%
- Developer satisfaction: High

## Timeline

- Q1 2026: Optimization (performance, coverage automation)
- Q2 2026: Excellence (advanced patterns, best practices)
